subject: Shooting (Sport)
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. has obtained an arrest warrant for the former N.B.A. player Javaris Crittenton, who is wanted in Atlanta on murder charges in the shooting of a 22-year-old woman, Jullian Jones.
snippet: The F.B.I. has obtained an arrest warrant for the former N.B.A. player Javaris Crittenton, who is wanted in Atlanta on murder charges in the shooting of a 22-year-old woman, Jullian Jones.
